availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Brown (Morgan County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier.)

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Brown. Father of John C. Brown. Merchant in Morgan County in 1860. Captain in the 45th Mounted Kentucky Infantry from December 1863 to February 1864. Lieutenant colonel of the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia in 1864.

bibl.p: George W. Brown, 45th Mounted Kentucky Infantry, Compiled Service Record, (https://www.fold3.com/image/272/235096900) (accessed on May 18, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, District No. 1, p. 53.
